title: Southeast US has hit the roof of CDC’s respiratory illness level scale
description: Uptake of flu shots is lagging this year, CDC says.

title: LockBit ransomware suspect nabbed in Canada, faces charges in the US
description: Automation features make LockBit one of the more destructive pieces of ransomware.

title: Control, one of ray tracing’s first killer apps, is getting a sequel
description: One of PC gaming's proudest new franchises is going big.

title: DeviantArt upsets artists with its new AI art generator, DreamUp
description: Confused artists discover their work is used for AI training by default.

title: NASA says its SLS rocket is good to go for a launch attempt next Wednesday
description: "If we didn’t design it to be out there in harsh weather we picked the wrong launch spot."

title: The future exists now: Bringing William Gibson’s The Peripheral to television
description: Ars chats with series producers Jonathan Nolan, Vincenzo Natali, and Scott Smith.

title: Musk proposes turning Twitter into a bank to avoid bankruptcy
description: Musk aims to grow Twitter users by 1 billion, then link accounts to debit cards.

title: Leica’s “Leitz Phone 2” has a giant 1-inch camera sensor, magnetic lens cap
description: If you've got to rebrand an existing phone, the Aquos R7 is a good starting point.

title: Musk’s Twitter chaos tosses outrageous insulin pricing into the spotlight
description: Fake pharma account ignited fury over insulin pricing by falsely saying it's now free.

title: Razer’s new wireless mouse has an exceptionally customizable scroll wheel
description: Let's just hope the wheel's not too rattly.

title: Robots will roam a university to study “a socio-technical problem”
description: Robots will wander a Texas campus so researchers can study human-robot relations.

title: Surface 9 Pro teardown reveals modular parts, Microsoft’s 2023 repair plans
description: Microsoft says it will offer parts, manuals, and retail repair in early 2023.

title: Twitter quietly drops $8 paid verification; “tricking people not OK,” Musk says
description: Twitter usage is up, Musk says, as fake accounts wreak havoc.

title: Game over for FTX as CEO-founder quits and company files for bankruptcy
description: Collapse comes after FTX failed to meet surge in customer withdrawals.

title: California climate measure fails after “green” governor opposed it
description: Prop 30 would've taxed wealthiest residents to build EV infrastructure, wildfire protection.

title: Rocket Report: Indian commercial rocket has launch date; Branson must face lawsuit
description: "As this was a final qualification test, we also tested it to destruction."

title: Microsoft links Russia’s military to cyberattacks in Poland and Ukraine
description: The hacking group Microsoft ID'd is among the world's most cutthroat and skilled.
